ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces
Interface Shader

All Known Implementing Classes:
GLShader
public interface Shader

Declares the functionality to manage shaders in Open GL ES 2.0.

Method Summary
 void disable()
          Disables the shader in OpenGL that is associated with this object.
 int getProgram()
          Gets the OpenGL representation of a shader.
 int load(java.lang.String vertexFileName, java.lang.String fragmentFileName)
          Loads a shader into OpenGL. uses the vertex and fragment shader source code to pass to OpenGL where the actual shader is created.
 void use()
          Uses the shader in OpenGL that is associated with this object.
 

Method Detail

load

int load(java.lang.String vertexFileName,
         java.lang.String fragmentFileName)
         throws java.lang.Exception
Loads a shader into OpenGL. uses the vertex and fragment shader source code to pass to OpenGL where the actual shader is created. An OpenGL shader is represented by an Integer id.

Parameters:
vertexFileName - the vertex shader file name
fragmentFileName - the fragment shader file name
Returns:
the id of the shader in OpenGL
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - the exception

getProgram

int getProgram()
Gets the OpenGL representation of a shader.

Returns:
the id of the shader

use

void use()
Uses the shader in OpenGL that is associated with this object.

disable

void disable()
Disables the shader in OpenGL that is associated with this object.
